header.title: When does criticism of Israel cross into anti-Semitism?

header.postText: The Fix's Eugene Scott analyzes the thin line between criticizing Israel and being labeled anti-Semitic, following Rep. Ilhan Omar's (D-Minn.) recent comments about AIPAC.
